Cytus 2.1.0 Autumn update is now available!

- 4 new tracks include 3 secret songs, discover them!
- Support new resolution for iPhone 5 and iPod touch 5
- Minor bug fixes and improvements

Cytus 1.1.0 patch note:

A quick and new update to Version 1.1.0 featuring

1. Two new tracks, one of them is a secret track.

2. New charts arrangement for some tracks for better playing experience

3. Auto-rotation is now working

Cytus 1.1.0 patch note:

A quick and new update to Version 1.1.0 featuring

1. Two new tracks, one of them is a secret track.

2. New charts arrangement for some tracks for better playing experience

3. Auto-rotation is now working

Cytus 6.1
Thanks to all fans round the globe, our Million Project has stepped through 600,000 downloads.

-Chapter 9 unlocked for free!

Cytus 1.2.0 patch note:

A new update to Version 1.2.0 featuring

1. Two new tracks, making a total of 19 songs in Cytus.

2. Now you can share score on Twitter.

3. New improved charts and difficulty levels for some tracks.
<

Cytus 1.2.0 patch note:

A new update to Version 1.2.0 featuring

1. Two new tracks, making a total of 19 songs in Cytus.

2. Now you can share score on Twitter.

3. New improved charts and difficulty levels for some tracks.
<

Thanks to the players’ enthusiastic support since 2011, the One Million Downloads Plan of Cytus has been officially completed.
As a token of our appreciation, Cytus 8.0 will bring unique contents to all of our players!

- Chapter K free and open

Thanks to the players’ enthusiastic support since 2011, the One Million Downloads Plan of Cytus has been officially completed.
As a token of our appreciation, Cytus 8.0 will bring unique contents to all of our players!

- Chapter K free and open

Cytus 9.0 released!

-Chapter L
Story written from 《L》 by Ice, rearranged and recorded by gaQdan (also written music for Implosion), Chapter L provides you a whole new page in the music game history, with 10 narrative orchestral pieces.

-C

Thanks for all your support to unlock Ch.6, it is an amazing collective effort.

Chapter S consists of symphonic remixed songs, a genre that's never been seen in Cytus before.
It can also be considered as a preview of the under developing 'Projec
